title: Experiencing High Ping, started at 12pm this afternoon.
body:
hi all,

Not sure if this is just my ISP, but ive been getting around 200 ping on OCE servers since 12pm today. Never happened before, my ping usually sits at around 30-40.

I can't seem to figure out what's wrong, ive reset my modem, reloaded the client and a few other things. My system is also fine for those who might have suggested that.

Any help would be appreciated!

xSynx

replies.body:
Hi Mindstar,

thanks for the swift reply! Here are the results of the trace.


Tracing route to 103.240.227.5 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  2    39 ms    39 ms    39 ms  172.24.193.5 
  3     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.


I picked the first OCE server on the list you gave me, if you require me to do the second one also let me know! Also my ISP is Optus.

Syn

Hey Syn

It looks like there is something up between you and your ISP.  Hop number 4 above already jumps up above 200 ping, which it really shouldn't, seeing as its within Optus itself.  Has anything else been affected with your internet since this started?

I'd suggest talking to your ISP to see if there is a problem, and possibly running through the suggestions in [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=pYV3HKZ0,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-08T03:50:52.127+0000)
>
> Hey Syn
> 
> It looks like there is something up between you and your ISP.  Hop number 4 above already jumps up above 200 ping, which it really shouldn't, seeing as its within Optus itself.  Has anything else been affected with your internet since this started?
> 
> I'd suggest talking to your ISP to see if there is a problem, and possibly running through the suggestions in [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

I spoke with my ISP today, apparently their has been some works done on the exchange here in the past couple of days. Thanks for your input though, ive never had this issue and thought it may have been an issue with the league servers.

Cheers,

Syn

Hey

What ISP are you with?  Can you run a [trace route](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) from your PC to the league server and post results?

Cheers
Mindstar
